title: Drive-Thru in the Bang Bus (Miami Recap w/ Peter Green)
description:
Get the full episode + 4 bonus episodes a month and instant access to the Patreon back catalog for $5 at www.patreon.com/stiffsockspod

The boys recap the Florida trip, talk about how aggressive Miami is,  riff on how everyone has a hangover cure, and learn what gaslighting is. Plus, Peter Green joins the show to celebrate 7k and give a Patreon exclusive post-Bang Bus interview. They talk about how the filming went, riff on smelly porn sets, and get a surprise drop-in from a legendary porn producer and director that's been in the business for over 20 years.
itunes:author: Trevor Wallace and Michael Blaustein
dc:creator: Trevor Wallace and Michael Blaustein
